text: I'm home.  Elisabeth brought me apple juice and aspirin, and now I'm crashing.  Goodnight, world!

text: Flight landed on time, customs was a breeze, now I'm sitting on an S-Bahn, waiting for it to take me home. I'm so ready to crash.

text: At the airport, waiting to board. The flight, I imagine, will suck.  I really can't wait to crash in my own bed in a few hours.

text: Heading back to the hotel to pick up my bag, then zipping over to London City for a flight back to Munich.  Looking forward to being home...

text: Drinking bad tea, and doing my expenses, since I don't think I'll have an backyard account tomorrow... Ugh.

text: So.  I'm at the office now because they kicked me out of the hotel.  I'm going to sit here quietly, and pretend not to be dying.
